about_the_game:
DLC containing the 1:8 nitro onroad GT3 Modified chassis, wheels, rubber tires, 3.5cc .21 engine, exhaust pipe and the beautiful new P911 GT3 and the C7 body which come different paintschemes with 8 color schemes.

The modified RS chassis has full setup options, ideal for the die-hard nitro on-road racer to tune the chassis to his liking. The GT3 car is very easy to drive, the ideal step into exciting 1:8 nitro on-road racing.

Recently added 9 new C7 GT3 bodies, each with 8 paint- and color variations! So 48 color and paint schemes to chose from!

Important note:
Before this DLC contained the Spec version of the GT3, this has now been replaced by the modified version. The Spec version is now free. Users who have purchased this DLC package before automatically now have the modified RS chassis and components in their list of VRC content!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP 3, .Net framework 3.5
  • Processor: Hyperthreaded Intel CPU, AMD Athlon 64 CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB Pixel Shader 2.0 graphics card (nVidia GeForce FX 5600 or ATI Radeon X600)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Windows 8, .Net framework 3.5
  • Processor: Multi-core CPU (Intel Core i5 or i7, AMD Phenom II QUAD X4)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB dedicated RAM, Pixel Shader 3.0 graphics card (AMD Radeon HD 5870, nVidia GTX 560)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: VRC USB adapter or controller, for hosting multiplayer sessions high upstream connection is recommended
